name: Death Chase clone
description:
CONTROLS:

1 - 0steer left and right8 - 9decelerate/accelerateSpacebarfire

Original game was created in 1983 by Micromega for the ZX Spectrum.

An emulated version can be found here

Credits:

Font: Mozart NPB by total FontGeek DTF, Ltd. via fontspace.com
https://www.fontspace.com/category/8-bit,commodore,monospaced

Explosion sound: 8-bit Explosion2.aif by timgormly via freesound.org/
https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170144/

All other audio is from the original game.
